website_summaries.verdict: Individually crafted, this 10-inch bowl is good looking and versatile.
pros: Deep sides help keep salads in place while tossing
Nicely crafted, and makes any food or displayed contents look artful
cons: Some reports of poor packaging resulting in damage on arrival

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful yet inexpensive. Just what I was looking for. Well worth the money. Update: Piece of crap. Bottom broke out within a few weeks. DO NOT ORDER.
customer_reviews.author: M Stathakopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to make a sink for my bathroom. It was perfect for the limited space I had.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mendez

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SALAD/ LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty to put on the dinning table, only if the salad dressing didn’t leak out from the bottom... I guess if you use it for dry stuff( fruit and snack) it will work ok. But then why call it a salad bowl then you expect this thing also can hold dressing and doesn’t leak!
customer_reviews.author: Hua

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was bit pricey for a salad bowl, but went ahead and purchased it. When it arrived, I was shocked at how gorgeous and sturdy it was! Used it the other day to make a salad — it was life changing! You see I’m just the type of girl to throw her salad on plate, pour a lot of dressing on top of it, and mix it while I eat it. But when I used this, it evenly mixed the dressing on the veggies. I didn’t even use too much dressing to ensure it’s all covered. Anyway, bottom line .. great purchase! It was easy to clean, wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid bowl. Maybe it's bit early (3 months into it) to leave this kind of comment, but structure is glued wood, it went through at least 50 clean wash and dry cycles, it doesn't show hint of damage. Very sturdy nicely designed bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kee

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: split open after first use. Would give it zero stars if possible. Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Cecile Foshee

customer_reviews.title: Beware. The quality of wood is in question.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a three because the wood actually looks fake. The color does not match the advertisement photo either. I do like how high the bowl is though. I store all of my supplements and like the fact that the unattractive labels are covered. Great size as well. Bigger than many of the salad bowls on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful acacia wood bowl
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bowl to serve salad as well as match other acacia wood kitchen pieces I recently purchased. This bowl is perfect for my needs. It is a nice size and I love the modern take on a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and sturdy bowl. It’s so pretty I am using it as a centerpiece on my table in addition to serving salads in it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Came cracked
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved everything about it if it hadn't arrived cracked! I had already thrown out the box and everyhting, so just used wood glue to put it together.. It came without any sort of cover or plastic, just the bowl itself and a few bubbles in a box. No wonder it broke..
customer_reviews.author: Jiwon Chang

customer_reviews.title: pretty but
customer_reviews.text: way over priced. I was expecting much more weight and detail for the price. still beautiful wood bowl. purchased as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and then some. I love it. Thanks to Simple Living Alaska for your YouTube that introduced me to the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl, but its HUGE! More of a fruit bowl or catering bowl. Way to big for everyday salad bowl. It would be perfect if it was half the size.
customer_reviews.author: Holdit

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my aunt and uncle for christmas and they loved it. It’s a great size for 2-4 people, and really nicely made
customer_reviews.author: erinhw

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my idea.
customer_reviews.text: It was way smaller than I assumed... I forgot to read the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Teach.this

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I cut it in half and made two home built banjos out of them
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin

customer_reviews.title: A good salad bowl and a great gift choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty and practical salad bowl. I've been using this salad bowl for a good while now, and it still looks brand new. Every now and again, a rub down with a little bit of baby oil on the exterior of the bow brings back the luster of the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mbeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Two side gaps on the bowl can not be used for salad
customer_reviews.text: The bowl came with two gaps on the side large enough to fit 3 knife blades and the gaps go top to bottom- i wanted a salad bowl and there is no way that this can work for that. The gaps do not look like defects more like very poorly finished product. Maybe it can be utilized as a fruit bowl if you can get past the fact that it looks like you purchsed defective product. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: D.Robev

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy bowl
customer_reviews.text: Good quality; use to chop salads. Nice and deep. Good looking too for serving.
customer_reviews.author: lklem

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful and serviceable salad bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and serviceable salad bowl. Good quality, nicely crafted and the deep sides prohibit a mess when tossing and retrieving salad. Really pretty on the table and just a nice way to serve a bowl of greens! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wood bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice large bowl. I use for salad, hot and cold food.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Big Bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice. It's really big! I measured but in real life it's visually bigger than the dimensions convey.
customer_reviews.author: language lover

customer_reviews.title: ... for a present so not sure how well they like
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a present so not sure how well they like it
customer_reviews.author: Jim Crawfis

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Really good bowl that we use for fruit and also as a salad bowl. Lightweight, but not cheap looking. This is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: the acacia wood looks great in any format
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. But I have used the matching salad bowls. When guests come, the salad will look extra attractive in this bowl. But, the acacia wood looks great in any format. Open your mind; don't limit it to salad.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Yarn Bowl made from a wooden salad bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Well made wooden bowl with wonderful lines and character. I used it not for food but I drilled a 5/8" hole in the side and used my jig saw to carve a small channel down from the lip in a "J" shape to the hole. Turning it into a Yarn Bowl for knitting. I put the ball of yarn in the bowl. Loop the yarn down through the "J" channel and feed it up through the hole. Keeps my yarn in place while knitting and is a wonderful looking bowl. I'm sure it is great for it's intended purpose of being a salad bowl too! A+++++ I would definitely buy Lipper International bowls again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert English

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the pictures!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic deal. great quality,much cheaper than in stores and looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: JACK&JEN

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Good for holding dry items only. Sides have cracks in them
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks
customer_reviews.text: The product leaks. Had the bowl for 3 months, used it only a handfull of times and now it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the bowl is leaking. Does not contain liquid.
customer_reviews.author: lekisha b

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is awesome. It looks great and is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive salad bowl. So attractive we leave it out on the kitchen island.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Differently shaped, very elegant salad bowl. Will use it for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy and pretty to look at. Easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great on the table
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl for any dining use, and it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wooden salad bowl was beautiful, and looked like it cost a lot more ...
customer_reviews.text: This wooden salad bowl was beautiful, and looked like it cost a lot more than it did. I was very pleased with the service I received and the item that was purchased. It arrived on time and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is heavy duty and beautiful! It's definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, modern bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, shape, and design. The straight sides look modern and elegant, and also free up a little extra cupboard space. I have been really careful with this bowl, based on reviews that indicate cracking. I seasoned it with a little olive oil, and I hand wash and dry it. I've had no cracking problems.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After first use developed large crack in side. Still usable, but still feel a little cheated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel it is poor quality. Wish I had not purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie clow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality!!! It felt apparat after the very first use!!!

customer_reviews.title: great bowl DONT TAKE IT OUT OF YOUR HOUSE IT WILL BE TAKEN
customer_reviews.text: GREAt bowl but left at friends house some time ago haven't been able to use
customer_reviews.author: elisabeth Gross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bowl
customer_reviews.text: My Hermanns tortoise is growing and I needed a soaking bowl for him. I had a really nice bowl beforehand for when he was smaller, but he grew so I was on a hunt for a bowl like this. I initially got his bowl when he was smaller at target, but I couldn't find a bigger bowl like this one. I went out on a limb and it fits him great also there's so much more room for him to grow! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: eananealo

customer_reviews.title: Great, but leaks if any liquid is in it.
customer_reviews.text: Great and beautiful bowl. Leaks however, if you put something like water in it. I had water in it, sitting for a little bit, and it leaked all over the place. I considered sealing the outside, but just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: The Great Ape

customer_reviews.title: This bowl has been a wonderful addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This bowl has been a wonderful addition to my kitchen. When all I want is a giant salad for dinner, this vessel serves me well and feels elegant to eat from. Two minor complaints are that it scratches easily and the shape can make it slightly difficult to clean the inside - nothing that will keep me from using and enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece however it was just too big for what I was planning to use it. I have had it returned.
customer_reviews.author: MheggY

customer_reviews.title: made very well
customer_reviews.text: love it! ot was for a diy project n worked out perfectly! nice finish, strong n sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Look great in our kitchen as fruit bowls
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these to use as our fruit bowls in the kitchen. They look great and are a good size. One of them holds a bag of lemons and a bag of limes and just comes to the brim, the other holds a bag of oranges and a couple of pomeganates and is just over the brim.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Collins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bowl! The colors exactly what i hoped for. The bowl arrived well packaged and delivered on time.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself but daughter ended up with it so now I have to buy one for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl; Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. Very pleased, but have yet to use it around the house. It's attractive, and looks almost exactly like the product shown by Amazon. Large. Perfect size for a salad for four or fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood
customer_reviews.text: I used mine as a planter. It's really pretty, the wood is lovely. It would be nice for many purposes!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought five of these and gave these as fruit bowls for family members at Christmas. They loved them. Looks great and great price

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, seems well made, I really like it @

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is beautiful! Well made with a beautiful grain. Great value for the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Great salad bowl with a high quality finish.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bowl. Has good finish and feels like a quality bowl. Upon receiving, I cleaned it, then oiled it with Olive oil. It's great. My only ding - just my personal preference - the bowl is about 5 inches tall and gets to be a handful when I'm washing it. I wish it was maybe an inch shorter. But it is certainly as described, and it looks just like the picture too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! So much better than i thought it would be highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: The STRAIGHT-SIDE Bowl is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is good quality and I feel very much worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Large, Practical, and Beautiful Salad Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Large, beautifully-made salad bowl. As with any salad bowl, it is NOT made for serving soup. This bowl makes a very handsome addition to our table when we have guests who never fail to comment on how attractive and practical it is.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small. Just the right size, and built well. Goes great with the matching "hands". We bought two sets of each. One set for when we are eating alone; both sets when we have guests.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Love this large bowl. It's great with family salads, fruit, and popcorn. The large bowl can be used for many things.

customer_reviews.text: it is well made and i decided to keep it BECAUSE the return procedure of the company costed the same or mabe a little more than the bowl....I felt that was disingenuous...really didnt like this about the company....I hadnt wanted a giant bowl...i wanted soup bowls. I didnt like the return policy and i dont think it was said up front Basically-its no returns

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous wood.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to put a 9 inch potted Christmas cactus in. Beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: well-received; popcorn-perfect (and then some)

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but cracked
customer_reviews.text: There was a crack on one of the glue joints from top to bottom. This has become my kitchen prep junk holder rather than a salad bowl.

product_meta.title: Lipper International Acacia Straight-Side Serving Bowl for Fruits or Salads, Large, 10" Diameter x 5" Height, Single Bowl
product_meta.description: Lipper International provides exceptionally valued items for the kitchen, home, office, and child's playroom. Known for their functionality and beauty, each of our products is individually crafted from the finest quality materials. These unique bowls are made from durable and acacia wood that is perfect for any decor. Use them to hold fruit, serve salads, or just to decorate around your home. Hand wash with a mild soap and cool water. Do not soak. Do not put in the dishwasher, microwave or refrigerator. Extreme changes in temperature will cause the material to crack over time. Dry thoroughly. Occasional use of mineral oil on the inside will help maintain its appearance. Accessories in images are not included.
feature_bullets: Beautiful acacia straight-sided bowl makes a wonderful serving bowl for fruits and salads
Generously sized with a contemporary design
Easy to care for - Hand wash only
1 large acacia straight-side bowl - Measures: 10" diameter x 5" high

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
